subject: Monte Carlo Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer took 52 minutes to defeat Radek Stepanek, 6-1, 6-2, in the third round of the Monte Carlo Masters. Rafael Nadal beat Teymuraz Gabashvili, 6-4, 6-1.
snippet: Roger Federer took 52 minutes to defeat Radek Stepanek, 6-1, 6-2, in the third round of the Monte Carlo Masters. Rafael Nadal beat Teymuraz Gabashvili, 6-4, 6-1.
